title: coinsmartotc
author: coinsmartotc
content: CoinSmart OTC White Glove Service- Selling BTC\USDT/USDC/ETH- +1.5% MARKET- CRYPTO ALL CLEAN FROM LPS- NEED TO KYC- 25K+ USD MINIMUM- TELEGRAM: cryptoinsights0

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 21, 2022, 07:28:30 PM- NEED TO KYCWhat on earth makes you think that someone would send their KYC to a new forum account?  Would you send your KYC to some newbie who made such a post as yours?Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 21, 2022, 07:28:30 PM- 25K+ USD MINIMUMYou are laughable troll.  Just fuck off, already.

comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on October 21, 2022, 09:56:35 PMQuote from: coinsmartotc on October 21, 2022, 07:28:30 PM- NEED TO KYCWhat on earth makes you think that someone would send their KYC to a new forum account?  Would you send your KYC to some newbie who made such a post as yours?Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 21, 2022, 07:28:30 PM- 25K+ USD MINIMUMYou are laughable troll.  Just fuck off, already.Have you googled Coinsmart?   One of the biggest OTC's in Canada.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: DynastyCrypto on October 22, 2022, 09:04:25 PMHave you googled Coinsmart?   One of the biggest OTC's in Canada.Oh, my bad.  One newbie vouching for another newbie certainly means this is legit.  What was I thinking?  Lad?  I mean, it's not like I could create a new account named BinanceOTC without actually being a representative of Binance.    Or, is it more likely is that both of these accounts belong to the same scammer and have nothing to do with Coinsmart?

I mean update the forum 24/7 and as soon some new posting, go in asap and complain and be bitter... when you was fresh. did you get treated at the same way? but I am happy for you that internet does exist, so you can be somebody, atleast somewhere. Keep on whining!

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 23, 2022, 03:24:06 PM~Maasdamer, is that you?  What's wrong, did someone thwart your latest $20 scam attempt?

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on October 23, 2022, 03:26:32 PMQuote from: Funnydruids on October 23, 2022, 03:24:06 PM~Maasdamer, is that you?  What's wrong, did someone thwart your latest $20 scam attempt?LOL, not me and also I never scammed anybody here nor did I try, I can show you my wallet transactions (btc, ltc, xrp) so you see I dont need to do anything like this. But then I also expect an apology from you for you blind hate against me.Why I was looking you up anyway, maybe you should do your job as a escrow holder to finally reply in the bet situation between fatman and nub, I mean you are online all the time but it seems its more important for you do make up stories then doing something you are actually getting paid for.

comments.author: coinsmartotc
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on October 23, 2022, 03:14:08 PMQuote from: DynastyCrypto on October 22, 2022, 09:04:25 PMHave you googled Coinsmart?   One of the biggest OTC's in Canada.Oh, my bad.  One newbie vouching for another newbie certainly means this is legit.  What was I thinking?  Lad?  I mean, it's not like I could create a new account named BinanceOTC without actually being a representative of Binance.    Or, is it more likely is that both of these accounts belong to the same scammer and have nothing to do with Coinsmart?See, people like you are the reason why people are hesitant to get into crypto. CoinSmart and the OTC team as a whole is trying to provide a service to potential clients globally. If you don't like what you post, then simply leave it and go on with your day. Why do you have to deliberately have to comment rude and false statements towards another man's business?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 23, 2022, 05:35:37 PMSee, people like you are the reason why people are hesitant to get into crypto.Actually, it's scammers like you that make people hesitant.  Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 23, 2022, 05:35:37 PMCoinSmart and the OTC team as a whole is trying to provide a service to potential clients globally.If you're a representative of coinsmart, why haven't you posted a link to their website?  7 posts already, and not one directing people to official site, why?  Why didn't you start a thread in the Services section with legitimate contact information?  And conversely, why did you start this scammy request in Currency Exchange, asking people for their KYC?  That's not how a professional representative of a legitimate exchange would behave. Quote from: coinsmartotc on October 23, 2022, 05:35:37 PMIf you don't like what you post, then simply leave it and go on with your day. Why do you have to deliberately have to comment rude and false statements towards another man's business?If coinsmart is your business, add a link to your Bitcointalk user profile on coinsmart's webpage, or post it using the official twitter profile.  Do that, and I promise to STFU.  Otherwise, I'll keep exposing you as the scammer I know you to be.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: If your intentions are genuine, then use and exchangeNeed KYC from your partners? Then I guess you shouldn't have any problem KYCing on exchanges like Binance such that you can even by the coins at much better rates, right?
